short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browsing with HyperTab! Add videos as tab backgrounds. Stunning and personalized, HyperTab enhances your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browsing experience with HyperTab! Our extension allows you to add customized videos as your new tab background, making each new tab a visually stunning and personalized experience. Whether it's a calming nature scene, a motivational clip, or your favorite movie moment, HyperTab lets you set the perfect video backdrop to inspire and uplift you every time you open a new tab. Easy to use and fully customizable, HyperTab brings your browser to life.
